mapper.select: SELECT distinct(d.no), d.dong, d.AptName, d.code, d.dealAmount, d.buildYear, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.jibun, i.lat, i.lng FROM housedeal d left JOIN houseinfo i on d.dong = i.dong and d.AptName = i.AptName where d.dong=#{dong}

SELECT distinct(d.no), d.dong, d.AptName, d.code, d.dealAmount, d.buildYear, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.jibun, i.lat, i.lng FROM housedeal d left JOIN houseinfo i on d.dong = i.dong and d.AptName = i.AptName where d.no=#{no};

SELECT distinct(d.no), d.dong, d.AptName, d.code, d.dealAmount, d.buildYear, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.jibun, i.lat, i.lng FROM housedeal d left JOIN houseinfo i on d.dong = i.dong and d.AptName = i.AptName where d.AptName = #{AptName} and d.dong=#{dong};

SELECT dong, floor(avg(dealAmount) * 1000) as dealAmount , cast(dealMonth as unsigned) as dealMonth FROM housedeal
WHERE dong = #{params}
GROUP BY dealMonth
, dong ORDER BY dong
SELECT count(*) as dealCount, dong FROM housedeal GROUP BY dong ORDER BY count(*) desc LIMIT 10
